p.b: The word wound has more than one meaning. It is also pronounced differently depending on the meaning.
p.p: Choose the sentence in which wound means "wrapped around something".

simpleChoice.p: Tallie's cat had a wound on its back paw.
We wound up going to the new movie.
Grandma wound her yarn around a piece of cardboard.
The knife was sharp enough to wound a person.
